name: Ludmilla (singer)
description: '''Ludmila Oliveira da Silva''' (born 24 April 1995), known mononymously as '''Ludmilla''' ({{IPA|pt|ludʒiˈmilɐ}}), is a Brazilian singer-songwriter who became known with the song "Fala Mal de Mim" (English: "talk smack about me"). In September 2020, she became the first [[Afro-Latin Americans|Afro-Latin American]] female musician to reach one billion streams on [[Spotify]].
